find-references/var-local.developer_comment: Lowercase 'var' refers to a local variable.

find-references/var-global.developer_comment: Uppercase 'VAR' refers to a global variable.

find-references/list-local.developer_comment: Lowercase 'list' refers to a local list.

find-references/list-global.developer_comment: Uppercase 'LIST' refers to a global list.
